CustomField.description: **SYSTEM FIELD - Identifies Sales Orders as ready for payment with a status of Unpaid and identifies Invoices with a status of Draft until it is posted and ready for payment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated/Override** Checked when the Sales Order is closed. Sales Orders close automatically when paid in full by the customer, when a contract expires, or when a contract/recurring Sales Order is cancelled.
CustomField.label: Is Closed
